      • normalizeTimeSeries

        public static java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> normalizeTimeSeries(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> timeSeries,
                                                                                                  int margin)
        Gets a series of time spans and merges overlapping spans according to the marginInMinutes value set in the constructor
        Parameters:

        margin - margin before and after each timespamp
        Returns:
        merged time series

      • getNormalizedTimeSeries

        public static java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> getNormalizedTimeSeries(java.util.List<VaultEntry> data,
                                                                                                      int marginBefore,
                                                                                                      int marginAfter)
        Generates a normalized TimeSeries with entry-Timestamps as input if no pre-processed TimeSeries is aviable.

        Has NOT the same effect as getting the filterResult.timeSeries of e.g. NoneFilter, which would return a single Timestamp containing all entries. This will return a List of ALL entry-timestamps, merged depending on the margin

        Parameters:
        data - List of VaultEntrys, containing Timestamps
        marginBefore - margin before each timespamp
        marginAfter - margin after each timespamp
        Returns:
        merged time series

      • getNormalizedTimeSeries

        public static java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> getNormalizedTimeSeries(java.util.List<VaultEntry> data,
                                                                                                      int margin)
        Generates a normalized TimeSeries with entry-Timestamps as input if no pre-processed TimeSeries is aviable.

        Has NOT the same effect as getting the filterResult.timeSeries of e.g. NoneFilter, which would return a single Timestamp containing all entries. This will return a List of ALL entry-timestamps, merged depending on the margin

        Parameters:
        data - List of VaultEntrys, containing Timestamps
        margin - margin before and after each timespamp
        Returns:
        merged time series

      • withinTimeSeries

        public static boolean withinTimeSeries(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> timeSeries,
                                       java.util.Date date)
        Checks if the given date is within one of the given timeSeries.
        Parameters:
        timeSeries -
        date -
        Returns:
        true, if the date is within one of the timeSeries
